name: Mars Commander
description:
Mars Commander is an FPS/Strategy game hybrid where you command an army of hover tanks across the surface of mars to annihilate the enemy. Destroy their Strategy Center to win the game, but be careful. If you lose yours', you're defeated.

Construct new buildings with engineers and produce new units with factories. 

Manage your economy by extracting metal and generating power using Extractors and Generators. Disrupt the enemy’s economy by destroying theirs’. 

Metal is a vital resource that can be extracted by Metal Extractors. Engineers can build these, but only on available Metal Patches. Scout for Metal Patches by guiding your units across the terrain.

Engineers and offensive units will act on their own. However, they need a skilled commander to maximize their effectiveness. Be that commander and lead your army to victory.

Upcoming features: 

- Advanced pathfinding and corresponding AI improvements.

- Maps set on Mars and other solar system bodies. 

- More units, including a mobile, controllable, highly-destructive bomb and a strategic missile launcher.

- Intense multiplayer action (1 vs 1 and 2 vs 2).
